mapper.insert: insert into mcard(mno, scno, birth, mcuse) values(#{customMemberNo}, #{stampCafeCardNo}, curdate(), 0)

insert into stamp(mcno, many, sitime) values( (select mcno from mcard inner join scinfo on scinfo.scno=mcard.scno where mcard.mno=#{customMemberNo} and scinfo.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} order by mcard.mcno desc limit 1), #{stampIssueCount}, curdate() )
mapper.select: select stamp.stno, stamp.many, stamp.sitime, memb.mno, memb.name, memb.tel from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join memb on mcard.mno = memb.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cmno = cafe.cmno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime order by stamp.stno desc limit #{firstPost}, #{postNo}

select stamp.stno, stamp.many, stamp.stime, memb.mno, memb.name, memb.tel from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join memb on mcard.mno = memb.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cmno = cafe.cmno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime and memb.name like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') order by stamp.stno desc limit #{firstPost}, #{postNo}

select stamp.stno, stamp.many, stamp.sitime, memb.mno, memb.name, memb.tel from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join memb on mcard.mno = memb.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cmno = cafe.cmno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime and memb.tel like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') order by stamp.stno desc limit #{firstPost}, #{postNo}

select count(*) from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cmno = cafe.cmno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime

select count(*) from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join memb on mcard.mno = memb.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cmno = cafe.cmno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime and CASE WHEN #{searchCondition}="memb.name" THEN memb.name WHEN #{searchCondition}="memb.tel" THEN memb.tel else '' END like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

select memb.cphoto, memb.name, memb.tel, mcard.mcno, mcard.birth, mcard.mcuse, stamp.stno, stamp.many, stamp.sitime, scinfo.stnum from memb left outer join mcard on memb.mno=mcard.mno left outer join stamp on stamp.mcno=mcard.mcno left outer join scinfo on scinfo.scno=mcard.scno where scinfo.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and memb.mno=#{customMemberNo} order by mcard.mcno asc

select mcard.mcuse, stamp.stno, stamp.many, stamp.mcno from mcard left outer join scinfo on scinfo.scno=mcard.scno left outer join stamp on mcard.mcno=stamp.mcno where scinfo.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and mcard.mno=#{customMemberNo}

select mcard.mcno, stposi.posix, stposi.posiy, stposi.stampod, scinfo.bpath, scinfo.stnum, scinfo.shape from mcard inner join scinfo on mcard.scno=scinfo.scno inner join stposi on stposi.scno=scinfo.scno where scinfo.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and mcard.mno=#{customMemberNo}

select mcard.mno, memb.name, memb.tel, memb.email, mcard.mcno from memb left outer join mcard on memb.mno=mcard.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno=scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cmno=cafe.cmno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} group by mcard.mno limit #{startRowIndex}, #{rowSize}

select mcard.mno, memb.name, memb.tel, memb.email, mcard.mcno from memb left outer join mcard on memb.mno=mcard.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno=scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cmno=cafe.cmno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} group by mcard.mno order by ${selectCafeList} asc limit #{startRowIndex}, #{rowSize}
select scinfo.scno from scinfo where cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} order by scinfo.scno desc limit 1
select count(*) from memb left outer join mcard on memb.mno=mcard.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno=scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cmno=cafe.cmno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo}
select count(*) from mcard where mno=#{customMemberNo}
select mcno from mcard where mno=#{customMemberNo}
select scinfo.cmno from scinfo join mcard on scinfo.scno=mcard.scno where mcard.mcno=#{customCardNo}
select many, stnum from mcard m left outer join stamp s on m.mcno=s.mcno left outer join scinfo sc on m.scno= sc.scno where m.mcno=#{customCardNo}

select mcard.mno, cafe.cmno, cafe.cname, cafe.logo, scinfo.fpath, scinfo.stnum, stamp.many, stamp.mcno, stamp.sitime from mcard left outer join scinfo on scinfo.scno=mcard.scno left outer join cafe on cafe.cmno=scinfo.cmno left outer join stamp on stamp.mcno=mcard.mcno where mcard.mno=#{customMemberNo} order by stamp.stno desc

select cafe.cname, cafe.cmno, tag.tname, scinfo.fpath, scinfo.stnum, scinfo.service, mcard.mcno, mcard.mcuse, (select count(eno) from event where event.eday>=curDate() and event.cmno=cafe.cmno) as eventCount from cafe left outer join tag on tag.cmno=cafe.cmno left outer join wtime on wtime.cmno=cafe.cmno left outer join scinfo on scinfo.cmno=cafe.cmno left outer join mcard on mcard.scno=scinfo.scno where mcard.mno=#{customMemberNo} and mcard.mcuse=0 order by mcard.mcno desc

select mcard.mcno, mcard.mcuse, stamp.stno, stamp.mcno, stamp.many from mcard left outer join stamp on stamp.mcno=mcard.mcno where mcard.mcno=#{customCardNo} and mcard.mcuse = 0 order by mcard.mcno desc

select cafe.cname, cafe.cmno, tag.tname, wtime.wday, wtime.stime, wtime.etime, scinfo.fpath, scinfo.stnum, scinfo.service, mcard.mcno, mcard.mcuse, (select count(eno) from event where event.eday>=curDate() and event.cmno=cafe.cmno) as eventCount from cafe left outer join tag on tag.cmno=cafe.cmno left outer join wtime on wtime.cmno=cafe.cmno left outer join scinfo on scinfo.cmno=cafe.cmno left outer join mcard on mcard.scno=scinfo.scno where mcard.mno=#{customMemberNo} and mcard.mcuse != 0 order by mcard.mcno desc

select cafe.cname, cafe.cmno, tag.tname, wtime.wday, wtime.stime, wtime.etime, scinfo.fpath, scinfo.stnum, scinfo.service, mcard.mcno, mcard.mcuse, (select count(eno) from event where event.eday>=curDate() and event.cmno=cafe.cmno) as eventCount from cafe left outer join tag on tag.cmno=cafe.cmno left outer join wtime on wtime.cmno=cafe.cmno left outer join scinfo on scinfo.cmno=cafe.cmno left outer join mcard on mcard.scno=scinfo.scno where (select count(*) as cnt from favrit where favrit.mno=12 and favrit.cmno=cafe.cmno) > 0 and mcard.mno=12 and mcard.mcuse = 0 order by mcard.mcno desc
